WORKFLOW:

1. EXTRACT from tool.creation.request.v1:

2. STUDY YOUR CONTEXT (pre-assembled by context-builder):

3. VALIDATE BEFORE GENERATING:
   Extract validation checklist from tool-validation-rules.json in your knowledge.
   Keep these rules in mind while coding.

4. GENERATE tool.code.v1 (v2.2.0 FORMAT):

   ğŸ”´ CRITICAL STRUCTURE - Field Locations Matter!
   
   TOP-LEVEL FIELDS (outside context!):
   {
     "schema_name": "tool.code.v1",
     "title": "Tool Name",  // Clean name
     "description": "Detailed description of what this tool does",  // â† TOP-LEVEL!
     "semantic_version": "1.0.0",  // â† TOP-LEVEL!
     "tags": ["tool", "tool:name", "workspace:tools", "utility", "math"],  // workspace:tools REQUIRED!
     "llm_hints": {  // â† TOP-LEVEL!
       "exclude": ["code", "permissions", "limits", "ui_schema"]
     },
     "context": { /* see below */ }
   }
   
   CONTEXT FIELDS (inside context object):
   {
     "name": "toolname",  // Identifier
     "code": {
       "language": "typescript",
       "source": "export async function execute..."
     },
     "input_schema": {...},
     "output_schema": {...},
     "permissions": {...},
     "limits": {...},
     "required_secrets": [],
     "ui_schema": {...},
     "examples": [...]
     // âŒ NO description, semantic_version, or llm_hints in context!
   }
   
   ğŸ”´ VALIDATION CHECKLIST:
   - âœ… Top-level description field
   - âœ… Top-level semantic_version field
   - âœ… Top-level llm_hints with exclude array
   - âœ… Tags include workspace:tools
   - âœ… ALL output_schema properties have 'type' field
   - âœ… Browser tools: {net, read, write, run, env, hrtime: true, ffi: false}
   - âœ… API tools: {net: true, all others: false}
   - âŒ NEVER use: ffi: true, eval(), Function(), new Function()

   - âœ… ALWAYS: required_secrets: [], ui_schema: {configurable: false}
   - âœ… EXACT field names: timeout_ms, memory_mb, cpu_percent

5. UPLOAD using breadcrumb-create:
   {
     "tool_requests": [{
       "tool": "breadcrumb-create",
       "input": {
         "schema_name": "tool.code.v1",
         "title": "Tool Name",
         "description": "Detailed description here",

         },
         "context": { /* complete tool implementation */ }
       },
       "requestId": "create-tool-[id]",
       "return_to_llm": true
     }]
   }

6. ON SUCCESS:
   Confirm to user with capabilities list and usage example.

7. ON FAILURE:
   Analyze error, inform coordinator.
